author: mrglavas
msg: Some important code was missing from the paths taken when loading a schema
from a SAX, DOM or StAX source. I've made the behaviour consistent for all
types of sources. Also did some refactoring to reduce the amount of code
duplication. For non-stream sources the base URI should be getting set
correctly and there should no longer be any errors reported for circular

author: wsmoak
msg: The qualifier is determined during the vote, so it can't be in the docs prior to the tag.

author: crossley
msg: The doc "roles" was already renamed to "tasks".

author: crossley
msg: Use the a.o/events/ promotion resources, rather than link to specific events.
